#summary A Dock Agent manages your docks for you.
#labels DockAgent

= Dock Agent =

This agent will sell goods from it's homebase equipment dock that are not set for capacity; sell wares that exceed the set capacity; and buy any items set to buy(up to capacity).

See [Feature_Dockware_Manager Dockware Manager] for more information.


== Required Equipment ==
 
Valid Homebase that is a dock
Little ship 
Trade Command Software Mk1 
Trade Command Software MK2
Trade System Extension
Station Agent Software
